description: Fires a small blast of magical enemy forward, damage increasing based on the user's maximum mana capacity. If it kills an enemy, refunds the mana cost. Uniquely, it can critically strike though a magic attack.

name: Bloody Evolution

description: Fires a large sphere that travels through enemies, dealing damage and marking them for 3 seconds, during which time they are heavily slowed. After the duration, they take damage equal to 50% of the base damage[Includes bonus damage from Gold Experience] taken while marked(+100% of the initial hit) as true damage and are stunned for 2s. If Crimson Court is active when the target takes damage, the duration will be refreshed. If enemies hit by this ability is killed while marked or while stunned by this ability, the cooldown is reduced by 50%.
name: Toki yo Tomare

Tool Id : 151
